BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 150200Z TO 220159Z DEC
   BY M/V SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING THREE 200 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-17.17S 040-06.30W, 22-25.33S 039-53.48W,
   22-27.20S 039-54.65W, 22-18.97S 040-07.32W.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 220259Z DEC 12.
